title: Electrospun polar-nanofiber PVDF separator for lithium–sulfur batteries with enhanced charge storage capacity and cycling durability
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3YA00392B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Irshad Mohammad, Luke D J Barter, Vlad Stolojan, Carol Crean, Robert C T Slade
A designer, polar and nanofibrous PVDF separator for lithium–sulfur battery cells mitigates the polysulfide-shuttling effect that currently limits their potential for commercialisation.
